name: Solitaire Card Collection Plus
description:
This is the ultimate Solitaire Card Collection and a Deluxe edition.

Solitaire Card Deluxe offers:

> 10 different solitaires (more to come in the next releases)

> 35 variants for hours of entertainment and challenges

> 46 leaderboards

> Each solitaire has its own tutorial

> 280 challenges to win Trophies

> 75 different card sets to enhance your experience by customizing your card deck (3 card front, 25 card back to choose from)

The games:

> 40 Thieves
> Montana (6 variants)
> Pyramid (6 variants)
> Cruel (4 variants)
> Golf (2 variants)
> Black Hole (2 variants)
> Poker (6 variants)
> Klondike (4 variants)
> Scorpion (2 variants)
> Wasp (2 variants)


This game has NO Ads.


NB: We have many other strategy or action games.
